# bps: validations: loop-3

on 3 rpis,

```bash
@bps loop start simulate,upload
```

after a few minutes,

```bash
@bps loop stop [rpi <machine-name>]
```



<details>
<summary>publication</summary>

```bash
runme() {
	local object_name
	for object_name in \
		bps-loop-2025-10-30-18-03-01-l6ulkz \
		bps-loop-2025-10-30-18-02-44-jajwbj \
		bps-loop-2025-10-30-18-28-48-4e4g65; do
			@assets publish \
				download,extensions=png,push \
				$object_name
	done
}

runme
```

</details>
